about_the_game:
Don't let this be their last dusk

The Dusk Alliance is a cooperative survival horror game set in a post-apocalyptic world.
As a Dusk Agent, your task is to explore procedurally generated environments, find valuable materials and help humanity's last colonies survive the night.



  • Multiple playable Dusk Agents to choose from.
  • Up to 4 players online cooperation.
  • Explore procedurally generated caves and loot material.
  • Use defensive and offensive tools to survive the night.
  • Gain experience and improved abilities along the way, and unlock new outfits for your Agents.
  • Dynamic lighting with time of day. Don't miss your train!

name: The Dusk Alliance

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Graphics: NVidia RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
